description: This file defines a React functional component for the login page of a Next.js application, handling user authentication via email/password and Google OAuth, with UI elements and state management.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering the login form and handling user login logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Async function that attempts to log in the user with email and password, then navigates to the dashboard or displays an error message.
